snippet: Senate Republicans rebuffed their presidential nominee and won Senate Finance Committee passage of a one-year extension of the tax credit for wind energy, just four days after Mitt Romney's campaign announced it wanted the credit to die.
abstract: Senate Republicans rebuffed their presidential nominee and won Senate Finance Committee passage of a one-year extension of the tax credit for wind energy, just four days after Mitt Romney's campaign announced it wanted the credit to die.

headline.main: Senate Panel Passes Extension of Wind Energy Tax Credit
